name: Keyboard Warrior (itch) (Ben Chittenden)
description:
Keyboard Warrior is a PC riff off of the classic title Guitar Hero.

It requires keys 1-9 and once you start there is no stopping. (No Numberpad)

The song lasts for around 5 minutes so have fun!

Programming:

Ben Chittenden

Josh Couchman (https://joshhyyy.itch.io/)

Art:

Ben Chittenden

Music gratefully supplied by: 

Ryan White

Steve Barnard

Matthew Hopkinson
